name: Big Monster Balls
description:
Make the monster ball reach you!

Made as part of Games Made Quick 6+

https://itch.io/jam/666ames-made-quick

Developed by:

Renato Eike - Game Design, level setup, Main menu image

lucasvinbr - programming, audio editing

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - move the ball

Space - use the ball power. It could help you find out where the ball is.

Audio cues are played whenever the ball collides with something... sometimes the floor counts as collision
